main event: Observers in Ozona, Texas reported seeing a silver and red object with two red projections for a duration of 7 hours.
interesting points: The object was observed from approximately 1300Z to 2000Z local time., The object was moving slightly faster than the moon., The sightings were made using binoculars and a surveyor's transit., Positions of the sightings corresponded to the location of Venus at that time., The sightings involved multiple witnesses, including military personnel.
sighted object: silver and red object with two red projections
witness description: Civilians and military personnel from Ozona, Texas
